text:
Alexander Baillie Morrison (22 December 1930 – 12 February 2018) was a Canadian-born American scientist, academic, and public servant. He was a general authority of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church) from 1987 until his death. He was born in Edmonton, Alberta.
Morrison died in Bountiful, Utah on 12 February 2018 at the age of 87.

annotations.surface_form: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
